input_text:
Job Title: UI\/UX Designer

Location: Miami, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Details

Job Location

Miami, FL

Position Type

Full Time

Job Shift

Day

Description

Join our dynamic Miami-based tech startup, generously supported by venture capital, as we search for an experienced UI/UX Designer. At GoTu, we're revolutionizing the dental industry with our innovative, deep work platform. Imagine a seamless connection between licensed dental professionals and dental offices, bridging the gap for temporary and full-time staffing needs through our cutting-edge on-demand web and mobile platform.

Responsibilities include:

Have the ability to create polished, production-ready UI designsPossess the ability to conceptualize and communicate design ideas to stakeholders of all levels within an organizationClose collaboration with Product Manager, Tech Lead, Engineers & QA team members to ensure alignment and accuracy of end deliverablesHave the ability to create wireframes, user flows, visual design assets, and interactive prototypes/high fidelity mockups.Understand overall customer needs and ability to have a holistic view of design and user experience; ability to deliver on short-term needs that fit into long-term visionBe experienced with design sprints and the agile methodologyHave the ability to actively and constantly collaborate with other employees including product owners, designers, web and mobile engineers, quality-assurance engineers, leadership, and more


Why Join our Team?

Lucrative earnings: Unlock your potential with generous salary and exciting bonus opportunities that reward your hard work.Guided Success: Benefit from strategic mentoring and coaching, helping you reach new heights in your career.Hyper-Growth Thrills: Dive into the dynamic world of a hyper-growth startup, where every day brings new challenges and opportunities for personal and professional development.Innovative Tech Playground: Collaborate with cutting-edge technology and join a fast-paced team that thrives on innovation and forward-thinking.Amusing Ambiance: Experience the lively and fun culture of a startup where hard work is celebrated without sacrificing a sense of humor and enjoyment.


About:

GoTu is changing the way the world works - starting with the Dental Industry! We’re an ambitious and motivated tech startup. With multiple rounds of venture back funding, our platform and app are disrupting the dental staffing industry. Since launching in late 2019, we’ve built the largest community of nationwide hygienists and dental offices, dwarfing our established competition in the dental tech staffing space. It’s truly a matter of time until GoTu is the industry standard for dental staffing needs in the Dental Community!

We’re in the process of rapidly expanding the capabilities and functions of our app to capture even more market share, and we need high-quality, talented and driven individuals to come aboard and help make GoTu a Unicorn (Unicorn=Start-ups valued at $1 billion within five years of launch).

Qualifications

Key Competencies:

Bachelor degree in Graphic, Interaction, New Media or related Design field or comparable work experience - required2+ years of experience designing digital products on a variety of platforms, including web and mobile (iOS and Android) - requiredExceptional design skills, production value and a meticulous attention to art, detail and concepts to ensure highest quality of user experience and brand reputationRequires proficiency with Figma and/or other associated design toolsExperience with user interface design patterns and standard UCD methodologies across multiple platformsA robust professional Portfolio highlighting multiple projects and your direct contributionsA deep conceptual and tactical knowledge of UX industry standards, usability, trends in web designResults driven self-starter with a unique combination of technical knowledge, business acumen and strong general and emotional intelligence


Additional considerations:

Working understanding of the Staffing / Recruiting, PE and/or VC landscapeHigh growth startup experience a plusMust be in Miami area or open to relocation. This role is 5 days a week onsite in our Miami HQ.


We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
